Getting Started With Verno On Linux
===================================

The "verno" modules can be loaded manually by using the following commands:

.. note::
    *Redhat 7 is Required for this flow*

Commands Used::

    module use /opt/metagen_devflow/flows/traceability/1.21.0.0/IFX/modulefiles
    module load traceability/1.21.0.0

.. note::
    **Verno currently requires to be loaded manually. Future releases of "verno" will be integrated into Camino releases.**
